topics.title: can anyone create a zerotalk site like this one?
topics.body:
Is this zerotalk app open source? I really like this site. Who is the developer of this site?
It really is a great platform. I like to see where this is going over time. :)

topics.title: is it possible to edit, update our user name
topics.body: Username editing would be nice. And besides, what's the password of our username?

1@2.body: It is nice to see zeronet evolving.

3@20.body: What is so bad about javascript? Don't you use firefox, chrome, IE or Safari?

55@69.body: Paypal is evil. But thanks for the link anyway.

1@39.body: It would ne nice if users could also have profiles (maybe imported from onename.com or from nameid.org) based on namecoin.

1@6.body: Reddit, keep up the great work on zeronet.
